title: Update Failed: Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information
body:
Ok now before you say something like check other forums or delete the lol_launcher file delete RADS etc. My issue is my parents took my laptop charger coz i was up till 2 one night in a match and now im trying to download league on my Windows XP pc (yes old schoolish) heres the problem: it will update for a long time then step 2 or somewhere it would say the unspecified error thing. Now, i have tried deleting the file; repairing the file; dns flushing; uninstall reinstall; delete rads file; delete lol_air_client and the whole lot of it; even tried the so called change the region then change it back still hasnt worked. so really pissed off right now and {{summoner:3}} . deleting the files isnt helping reinstalling isnt helping. so rito help plox
http://i58.tinypic.com/16gzywo.jpg

replies.body:
Oh boy.

You've tried reinstalling League entirely and that did not fix it?

What service pack are you currently using?

i have windows XP service pack 3 league used to work before until my dad factory reset the pc and now the unspecified error keeps popping up. sorry for the late reply. also the it patches until about 32% and then says that thing in the pic^

There's no picture there, so I don't know what you're talking about.

Have you gotten the latest available version of DirectX installed on the system?

Have you tried running the patcher in admin mode?
ahh damn. i attached a picture, probs didnt show up. yes ive tried every possible thing

Oh, you mentioned how your father 'factory reset' the machine. Did you remember to reinstall all your computer's updates?

Wait, is that even still possible with XP? You might have to go and download the updates manually from Microsoft's site, if they're even still there.
